snippet: The company is apologizing for a series of ads highlighting how much its guests and hosts contribute in taxes, saying they struck “the wrong tone.”

byline.original: By SYDNEY EMBER and MIKE ISAAC

abstract: Airbnb is removing ads intended to highlight tax revenue generated by its hosts and guests in San Francisco; flippant tone of ads caused widespread anger and sarcasm on social media.
lead_paragraph: The company is apologizing for a series of ads highlighting how much its guests and hosts contribute in taxes, saying they struck “the wrong tone.”

headline.print_headline: Airbnb Removes Ads Highlighting Tax Contributions in San Francisco
headline.main: Airbnb Ads Flop in San Francisco
